```{r}
library(titanic)
library(stringr)
data("titanic_train")
titanic_train %>% 
  select(Name) %>% 
  slice(1:3) %>% 
  separate(Name, c("last_name", "first_name"), sep = ", ")

str_match(titanic_train$Name,
          ", ([A-Z][a-z]")
```
```{r}
library(babynames)
library(tidyverse)
my_name <- filter(babynames, name == "Burton")
head(my_name)

my_name %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = n, color = sex)) +
  ggtitle("Burtons over the years", subtitle = "Has not been super cool lately") +
  labs(y = "Numbers of name per year") +
  geom_point() +
  theme_classic()
```
